page.title: 05W. Buckfastleigh Home Life
page.content: There is no mains{gas}in the three villages (Scorriton, Combe and Michelcombe). Most people have {electricity}and some{calor gas.}Not everyone has mains{sewerage,}but most have mains{water,}although there are some exceptions. One farmer we interviewed gets his water from a spring and then purifies it. It was surprising to discover that not everyone has a{telephone,}but those we questioned all have{television sets. With regard to food storage, we learnt that not everybody has the facility of a{deep freeze,}but in each of the three villages, all the residents we interviewed own a{refrigerator.
